member.name: M:JKIRobot.Robot_Interface.Init(JKIRobot.Robot_Interface@)
member.summary: Initializes and starts the JKI Robot Application. Returns the application handle for later use. This must be called to use the application.

member.name: M:JKIRobot.Robot_Interface.SetGrabberPosition(JKIRobot.Robot_Interface,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the grabber position in % (0 = Closed, 100 = open). Takes the robot app handle as an input.

member.name: M:JKIRobot.Robot_Interface.GetRobotPosition(JKIRobot.Robot_Interface,JKIRobot.Robot__Position@)
member.summary: Returns all robot position parameters. Takes the Robot App handle as input.

member.name: M:JKIRobot.Robot_Interface.SetJointRotation(JKIRobot.Robot_Interface,JKIRobot.JointType,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the specified joint type to the position specified in DEG (0-360). Takes the app handle as an input.
